title: problem with the "Loot and crafting inventory"
body: why cant i access my loot and crafting inventory? every time i try it shows nothing but a black screen. help plz? i rly wanna open my chests.

replies.body:
This could be happening for a few reasons that are blocking you from accessing assets for hextech crafting.  The most common can be due to third party apps not interacting properly with the client, like play.tv or something else.  If you have any apps, remove them to get it fixed.  

The black screen can also indicate a problem with your connection that's failing to download assets for hextech.  In this case, your best bet is to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  

Let me know if you have any questions!
I have done the above steps and my hextech items still arent there.  I have the currency but none of the other items.  I also submitted a bug report regarding this.
